actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a 10 percent tax credit for investments in certain Central American democracies.
short_title: Central American Democracies Investment Tax Credit Act

summary.text: Central American Democracies Investment Tax Credit Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to permit a ten percent income tax credit for investments in any property owned by a U.S. person and used predominantly in El Salvador, Guatemala, or Honduras.

titles.title: Central American Democracies Investment Tax Credit Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a 10 percent tax credit for investments in certain Central American democracies.
